Articles.Content:
Good day! 
I continue in my efforts to achieve an asteroid mission.

Now I launch a probe to attach with the asteroid. The probe is on kerbin's orbit waiting for the right time to leave the orbital influence of the planet.

I accelerate time Inside the Tracking Station to let pass some days, when the asteroid is in the right position, I set the time acceleration to 1x. Then I cannot go out of the Tracking Station neither fly the probe or any other spacecraft. 

Edited August 17, 2016 by RogerCoyote

I've had this issue only once and it completely screwed me. It didn't happen in the tracking station but it sounds like the same thing. I was midway through a gravity assist with the Mun to escape Kerbins SOI and my pause menu became entirely unresponsive. Couldn't save, load, revert or switch to the tracking station. Just had to completely close my game.
